panelText.text: Although it is good that Ingrid spoke up and told Hilde that she couldn’t pay for the expensive bottle of wine, Ingrid should probably have avoided entertaining Hilde while we were in a bid process and Hilde was considering bids from competitors.

Ingrid’s manager makes it clear to her that appearances are important – especially during a bid process – and providing meals and entertainment during a bid could look like a bribe and may cause issues for Johnson Controls and any involved employee.
